It is about 20 miles North of the city of Chicago. The Population is around 5500 people. The city is primarily a residential village, with a small section of commercial real-estate.

value: I-94/US-41 (local Interstate, known to locals as the Edens expressway), Five minutes from the interstate, with connections to other local suburbs.

value: content=Popular area for fishing, kayaking, canoeing, and family picnics.

New Trier Township High School Northfield Campus, One of the area’s biggest, most popular high schools. This campus is primarily for the freshman class, the rest of the students attend New Trier’s East campus (located in Winnetka, Il). Known for high level academics, sports teams, and public service. Student Body can be estimated to be above 4,000, with about 300 faculty.
content=At this facility all the research for Kraft food is done. Also, product and development and some manufacturing does occur. This building is HUGE.

content=Starting in late May through early September local farmers come to sell everything from fresh produce to milk and cheese. Other vendors sell baked goods and popcorn. A good place to meet and greet with the local people in the town to find out what is happening during the week. Weekends only. Located across from New Trier High School(in the field).

content=Holds a wide variety of events for the whole community ranging from summer events to fitness classes, and camps for kids and everything in between. Many grea Facilities that allow for all kinds of fun for the entire family.
content=Local grocery store. Right off the main road running through town. Recently renovated.

content=The place to go if you are looking for to keep up with the trendy fashions on shoes. Popular with all ages of women, many different brands and selection of accessories aswell. Other locations throughout Chicagoland.
address=310 S. HAPP ROAD NORTHFIELD, IL
content=It is the local tennis shop that has a wide variety of tennis products. Located in the main shopping area of the city.

content=A local restaurant were all the locals go to have breakfast. They offer everything from your basic scrambled eggs and toast to a creative take on a contemporary breakfast. The employees are all so friendly and the food is so much like your mom makes it you won't even believe your not at home. Good home-made cooking. The location very close to interstate and main area of town.
content=A local bar/tavern type of setting. Full service restaurant and bar. Open all year round, good for a family trip out to dinner.

content=Spanish cuisine with a wide selections of food, ranging from tapas to full meals. You can sit in or out and even bring your dog one day a week during the summer.Lunch

content=A local baerky that makes all sorts of cakes, cookies, and other treats. 7AM-5:30PM Monday thru Friday

content=A new take on pizza, salads, sandwiches, and subs. A creative take on pizza allows customers to costume make their own starting from the crust and building up. You can make a pizza with any combinations of toppings to satisfy even the pickiest eaters. This restaurant is also very sensitive to food allergies can make a pizza with out cheese!
content=A wide variety of coffee, tea, pastries, and other food and beverage. Free Wifi and a local place to meet with friends.
